languages.text: "Особый дар для особого дитя. Она родилась с ним и с ним же росла все эти годы. Нестабильность... Иногда мешала ее обучению, но мы научились пресекать большинство вспышек. Пока дитя в спокойствии и уединении — силы не могут взять верх над ее разумом".

traits.locale_text: "Особый дар для особого дитя. Она родилась с ним и с ним же росла все эти годы. Нестабильность... Иногда мешала ее обучению, но мы научились пресекать большинство вспышек. Пока дитя в спокойствии и уединении — силы не могут взять вверх над ее разумом".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."
languages.original_text: "Особый дар для особого дитя. Она родилась с ним и с ним же росла все эти годы. Нестабильность... Иногда мешала ее обучению, но мы научились пресекать большинство вспышек. Пока дитя в спокойствии и уединении — силы не могут взять верх над ее разумом".

traits.locale_text: "A special gift to a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... Sometimes got in the way of her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and stays in seclusion, the powers cannot hold sway over her mind."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "A special gift to a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... Sometimes got in the way of her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and stays in seclusion, the powers cannot hold sway over her mind."

The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."

traits.locale_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “那是赐予特别的孩子的特别礼物。她生来就拥有这样的力量，在这种力量的影响下长大成人。这种不稳定的力量……有时会妨碍她的教育，但我们已经找到了方法，可以防止绝大部分的力量爆发。只要这孩子保持冷静，始终处于离群索居的状态，这种力量就无法控制她的思想。”
languages.original_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."

traits.locale_text: “那是赐予特别的孩子的特别礼物。她生来就拥有这样的力量，在这种力量的影响下长大成人。这种不稳定的力量……有时会妨碍她的教育，但我们已经找到了方法，可以防止绝大部分的力量爆发。只要这孩子保持冷静，始终处于离群索居的状态，这种力量就无法控制她的思想。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Es un don especial para una niña especial. Nació con él y creció bajo su influjo. La inestabilidad... en ocasiones dificultó su educación, pero aprendimos a evitar más ataques. Mientras esté tranquila y aislada, los poderes no pueden controlar su mente».
languages.original_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."

traits.locale_text: «Es un don especial para una niña especial. Nació con él y creció bajo su influjo. La inestabilidad... en ocasiones dificultó su educación, pero aprendimos a evitar más ataques. Mientras esté tranquila y aislada, los poderes no pueden controlar su mente».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「特別な子供への特別な贈り物。彼女はその影響を受けて育った。不安定で…ときに教育の妨げになることもあったが、ほとんどの暴発は防げるようになった。子供が平静を保ち、隔離されている限り、力は彼女の心を支配することはできない」
languages.original_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."

traits.locale_text: 「特別な子供への特別な贈り物。彼女はその影響を受けて育った。不安定で…ときに教育の妨げになることもあったが、ほとんどの暴発は防げるようになった。子供が平静を保ち、隔離されている限り、力は彼女の心を支配することはできない」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Eine besondere Gabe für ein besonderes Kind. Sie wurde damit geboren und wuchs unter ihrem Einfluss auf. Die Instabilität... störte bisweilen ihre Ausbildung, aber wir haben gelernt, die meisten Ausbrüche zu vermeiden. Solange das Kind ruhig und in Abgeschiedenheit bleibt, können die Kräfte ihren Geist nicht übernehmen."
languages.original_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."

traits.locale_text: "Eine besondere Gabe für ein besonderes Kind. Sie wurde damit geboren und wuchs unter ihrem Einfluss auf. Die Instabilität... störte bisweilen ihre Ausbildung, aber wir haben gelernt, die meisten Ausbrüche zu vermeiden. Solange das Kind ruhig und in Abgeschiedenheit bleibt, können die Kräfte ihren Geist nicht übernehmen."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Un cadeau très spécial, pour une enfant qui ne l'est pas moins. Elle est née avec ce don et a grandi sous son influence. Son... instabilité a parfois représenté un obstacle dans son éducation, mais nous avons appris à gérer la majorité de ses crises. Tant que l'Enfant reste calme et isolée, ses pouvoirs ne peuvent pas prendre le contrôle de son esprit. »
languages.original_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."

traits.locale_text: « Un cadeau très spécial, pour une enfant qui ne l'est pas moins. Elle est née avec ce don et a grandi sous son influence. Son... instabilité a parfois représenté un obstacle dans son éducation, mais nous avons appris à gérer la majorité de ses crises. Tant que l'enfant reste calme et isolée, ses pouvoirs ne peuvent pas prendre le contrôle de son esprit. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Özel bir çocuğun sahip olduğu özel bir güç. O şekilde doğdu ve onun etkisi altında büyüdü. Bu kararsızlık bazen eğitimini sekteye uğratsa da çoğu taşkınlığı nasıl önleyebileceğimizi öğrendik. Çocuk sakin kaldığı ve tecrit edildiği sürece güçleri, zihnini ele geçiremiyor."
languages.original_text: "A special gift for a special child. She was born with it and grew up under its influence. The instability... sometimes hampered her education, but we learned to prevent most outbursts. As long as the child remains calm and remains in seclusion, the powers cannot take hold of her mind."

traits.locale_text: "Özel bir çocuğun sahip olduğu özel bir güç. O şekilde doğdu ve onun etkisi altında büyüdü. Bu kararsızlık bazen eğitimini sekteye uğrattı ama çoğu taşkınlığı nasıl önleyebileceğimizi öğrendik. Çocuk sakin kaldığı ve tecrit edildiği sürece güçleri zihnini ele geçiremiyor."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
